in.srain.cube.concurrent

Class SimpleTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.srain.cube.concurrent.SimpleTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DownloadTask, ImageLoader.LoadImageTask

    public abstract class SimpleTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class which encapsulate a task that can execute in background thread and can be cancelled. memory require:

    Shadow heap size of AtomicInteger: 12 + 4 = 16 bytes; Shadow heap size of SimpleTask: 12 + 4 + 4 = 20. After aligned: 24 bytes; Retained heap size of SimpleTask: 16 + 24 = 40 bytes.
